title: Generate and add the INOVICS presentation deck (.pptx) to the project files

requirements.text: Generate the complete INOVICS corporate presentation deck as a PowerPoint (.pptx) and add the resulting file to the repository so it is available from the project’s Files panel (no external links). The deck must follow the project styling notes: dark navy background (similar to #0D1B2A), yellow accent (in the #FFC300 range), clean enterprise look, bold typography, minimal bullet points, abstract data/grid visuals, and no stock/cheesy imagery or heavy icons. Use the exact slide-by-slide content previously provided in the conversation and keep the deck length within 12–14 slides (target 14).

quotes:
Create the pptx file in the project

and I’ll place the full deck there for you to download.

acceptanceCriteria: A .pptx file for the INOVICS deck exists in the project repository (committed as a binary asset) and is visible/downloadable from the Files panel.
The PPTX opens successfully in PowerPoint/Google Slides without layout breakage or missing fonts/assets.
The deck contains 12–14 slides (target 14) and uses the exact slide-by-slide content from the prior conversation.
Visual style matches the specified dark navy + yellow accent theme, with bold headings, minimal bullets, and abstract data/grid visuals; no stock/cheesy imagery or heavy iconography is used.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any path listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
Do not introduce external services, APIs, or databases to generate or store the PPTX.
nonGoals: Adding a new in-app UI button/link to download the PPTX from the running website (not requested in the latest user message).
Implementing backend storage or serving logic for the PPTX.
